definitions.description: Entity for purchased goods and services.

constantValues: Entity for purchased goods and services.

members.name: purchasedgoodandserviceId
members.description: Unique identifier for entity instances

members.name: TTLInSeconds
members.description: Time to live in seconds.

members.name: partitionId
members.description: Logical partition id. A logical partition consists of a set of records with same partition id.

constantValues: Logical partition id. A logical partition consists of a set of records with same partition id.

members.name: createdOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: modifiedOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was modified.

members.name: importSequenceNumber
members.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

constantValues: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn
members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: name
members.description: The name of the purchased good and service.

constantValues: The name of the purchased good and service.

members.name: consumptionenddate
members.description: End date of activity consumption.

members.name: consumptionstartdate
members.description: Start date of activity consumption.

members.name: cost
members.description: Cost associated with activity data.

members.name: costunit
members.description: Unit associated with the cost quantity.

constantValues: Unit associated with the cost quantity.

members.name: customdimension
members.description: Field where Custom Dimension values are stored in JSON format.

constantValues: Field where Custom Dimension values are stored in JSON format.

members.name: dataqualitytype
members.description: Description of the data quality which identifies if the data is actual, estimated, or other descriptors of the data.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'dataqualitytype_display' is added to the 'PurchasedGoodAndService' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'dataqualitytype'
supportingAttribute.name: dataqualitytype_display

constantValues: Description of the data quality which identifies if the data is actual, estimated, or other descriptors of the data.

members.name: description
members.description: Optional description that provides additional detail about the entity or attribute.

constantValues: Optional description that provides additional detail about the entity or attribute.

members.name: evidence
members.description: Optional field where evidence can be linked to the entity or attribute, if required.

constantValues: Optional field where evidence can be linked to the entity or attribute, if required.

members.name: facilityid
members.description: Unique identifier used to associate the facility with the purchased good and service.

constantValues: Unique identifier used to associate the facility with the purchased good and service.

members.name: goodsquantity
members.description: Quantity of goods in the corresponding activity data.

constantValues: Quantity of goods in the corresponding activity data.

members.name: goodsunit
members.description: Unique identifier for the goods unit in the purchased good and service.

constantValues: Unique identifier for the goods unit in the purchased good and service.

members.name: industrialprocesstypeid
members.description: Unique identifier for the industrial process type associated with the purchased good and service.

constantValues: Unique identifier for the industrial process type associated with the purchased good and service.

members.name: organizationalunitid
members.description: Unique Identifier for Organizational Unit associated with Purchased Good and Service

constantValues: Unique Identifier for Organizational Unit associated with Purchased Good and Service

members.name: quantity
members.description: Generic quanity field associated with activity entities.

constantValues: Generic quanity field associated with activity entities.

members.name: quantityunit
members.description: Unique identifier for Unit associated with Purchased Goods and Services.

constantValues: Unique identifier for Unit associated with Purchased Goods and Services.

members.name: origincorrelationid
members.description: An optional identifier to correlate record with data origin.

constantValues: An optional identifier to correlate record with data origin.

members.name: transactiondate
members.description: Date associated with the actual date when the transaction occurred.

constantValues: Date associated with the actual date when the transaction occurred.

members.name: spendtypeid
members.description: Unique identifier for the spend type associated with the purchased good and service.

constantValues: Unique identifier for the spend type associated with the purchased good and service.

members.name: valuechainpartnerid
members.description: Reference to the value chain partner or supplier associated with the transaction.

constantValues: Reference to the value chain partner or supplier associated with the transaction.

members.name: productfootprint
members.description: Product carbon footprint that this activity contributes to, such as first-party end product.

constantValues: Product carbon footprint that this activity contributes to, such as first-party end product.

members.name: productfootprintreporting
members.description: Product carbon footprint that contributes to this activity, such as part in supply chain.

constantValues: Product carbon footprint that contributes to this activity, such as part in supply chain.
